menu

Class GiftMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.GiftMenu

  • public class GiftMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    GiftMenu allows the player to send up to 5 free gifts(seeds) per day to his friend

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GiftMenu()
      GiftMenu constructor

      Displays the gift menu with the gift available to send
      void displayPlayerDetails()
      Displays the player's fullname, rank and gold

    • Method Detail

      • displayGiftMenu

        public void displayGiftMenu(Player loggedInPlayer,
                            RankController rankCtrl,
                            SeedController seedCtrl,
                            PlayerController playerCtrl,
                            GiftController giftCtrl,
                            FriendController friendCtrl)
        Displays the gift menu with the gift available to send
        Parameters:
        loggedInPlayer - the player of this farm
        rankCtrl - to retrieve player rank info
        seedCtrl - to check if player has seeds to send
        playerCtrl - to retrieve player's friend player object
        giftCtrl - to retrieve/perform gift related functions
        friendCtrl - to check if the sendee is a friend of player

      • displayPlayerDetails

        public void displayPlayerDetails()
        Displays the player's fullname, rank and gold
